comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by v02460.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has obsoleted [matrix-synapse-1.105.0-1.fc40](https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-f21d80c138), and has inherited its bugs and notes.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
This update has been pushed to stable.
